mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `rule` (project_id, name, description, trigger_event, outer_logic_op, enabled) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{triggerEvent}, #{outerLogicOp}, #{enabled})
mapper.select: select r.id, r.name, r.trigger_event, r.enabled, rt.target_type, ra.action_type FROM rule r LEFT JOIN rule_target rt on r.id = rt.rule_id LEFT JOIN rule_action ra on r.id = ra.rule_id where r.project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT DISTINCT r.* FROM rule r JOIN rule_target t ON r.id = t.rule_id WHERE r.enabled = 1 AND ( (t.target_type = 'DEVICE' AND t.target_id = #{deviceId}) OR (t.target_type = 'TYPE' AND t.target_id = (SELECT devicetypeid FROM device WHERE id = #{deviceId})) )
